E-Mail Messages
Date: Saturday, 5/31/1992
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Bob L. Gibson



Date: Tuesday, 6/3/1992
Subject: Status of Eric Anthony
Dear Sir,
Eric Anthony shouldn't play at AA Hagerstown Suns!
He has an AVG of .248 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 7/14/1992
Subject: Progress of Mike Redmond
Dear Sir,
Mike Redmond has nothing more to prove at AA Hagerstown Suns!
He has an AVG of .286 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
